interlinear-text.item: I sacrifice myself for my flower 2

phrase.item: In your cup you have wine, my heart and all my insides are burned [kebab]. Half of my life is wasted, I sacrifice myself for my dear, I sacrifice myself for my nightingale.
Your gun is ready, you and I are side by side, [lit. color with color] now we go to war together.
I sacrifice myself for my darling, I sacrifice myself for my nightingale.
I directed the water toward the high water channel, I remembered my darling, she missed [me] with a heavy [lit. bad] heart, I sacrifice myself for my darling, I sacrifice myself for my nightingale.
You are wearing a beautiful outfit, my heart and all my insides split, [but] there is nothing I can do.
I sacrifice myself for my darling, I sacrifice myself for my nightingale.
